text: Sahajatri was a Bengali drama film directed by Agradoot. This movie was released on 10 March 1951 in the banner of M. P. Productions Pvt. Ltd. The music direction was done by Rabin Chattopadhyay. This movie starring Uttam Kumar, Molina Devi, Bharati Devi, Sabitri Chatterjee and Kamal Mitra in the lead roles. ==Plot== ==Cast== * Bharati Devi * Uttam Kumar * Gouri Shankar Panda * Goutam Mukhopadhyay * Haridhan Mukhopadhyay * Jahar Gangopadhyay * Kamal Mitra * Sabitri Chatterjee * Karabi Gupta * Molina Devi * Probha Debi * Panchanan Bhattacharya ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Indian films Category:1951 drama films Category:1950s Bengali-language films
title: Sahajatri
